name: Line Drawing
description:
Work In Progress Line Drawing game. The goal is to get a ball into a net by drawing lines that act as platforms and ramps. There are obstacles and hazards that you need to work around to complete each level. There is also a sandbox mode where you can draw anything you like.

What it's missing:

  • The game currently has no sound effects
  • It's missing the last level
  • The game doesn't save your progress when you close it down
  • Quality of life improvements
    • Icons for the ball and goal when you zoom out too far (could be hard to find again)
    • A feature to delete individual lines. Maybe ones that the mouse is hovering over or something. (currently only an undo)
  • Overall art improvements, such as rescaling of UI and better menu
  • A TITLE lmao
